summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2847 for the improvement of West Sixty-third Street, from Twenty-eighth Avenue Northwest to Thirtieth Avenue Northwest, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, together with the necessary cross-walks; providing for the surface drainage; doing such grading and regarding as may be necessary, under Ordinance No. 34414, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
